concept.title: X window
concept.shortdesc: The X-window is the first window displayed when you log in to X Client.

conbody.p: The left panel of the window, called the Device Navigator, displays the devices in the plant in an explorer-like tree view. The Device Navigator toolbar, located at the bottom of the Device Navigator enables you to switch between views.

The right panel of the window is called the function pane, and is the work area for the function currently selected. A row of tool buttons at the top of the functional pane enables you to switch between functions.The status area provides information on your current selection in the X-Client, and displays the process when X-Client is performing some operation.
